languages.text: Игнорируя мольбы о помощи, Лорд-капитан бросил{mf|ся|ась} к выходу, но тут же поскользнул{mf|ся|ась} на крови Леди-Навигатора и упал{mf||а}, распоров руку об осколки стекла. Нечто впилось острыми когтями в ногу Лорд-капитана: твари из картины, поглотив Леди Кассию, затащили в пучины тьмы свою вторую жертву.

traits.locale_text: Игнорируя мольбы о помощи, Лорд-капитан бросается к выходу, но тут же поскальзывается на крови Леди-Навигатора, падает, распарывает руку об осколки стекла, встает — и снова падает. Нечто впивается острыми когтями в ногу Вольного Торговца мертвой хваткой — обжигающее и ледяное одновременно. Демоны из картины уже поглотили Леди Кассиию — ее образ, пурпурно-золотое пятно, тает в клубящейся на холсте крови. И демоны из глубин сотворенного мира затаскивают следом в пучины тьмы свою вторую жертву.

languages.text: Ignoring Cassia's pleas for help, the Lord Captain dashed for the exit but immediately slipped on a pool of the Lady Navigator's blood and fell, cutting {mf|his|her} hand on shards of glass. Something dug its claws into the Lord Captain's leg and the creatures from the painting, having already consumed Cassia whole, dragged their second victim into the dark abyss.
languages.original_text: Игнорируя мольбы о помощи, Лорд-капитан бросил{mf|ся|ась} к выходу, но тут же поскользнул{mf|ся|ась} на крови Леди-Навигатора и упал{mf||а}, распоров руку об осколки стекла. Нечто впилось острыми когтями в ногу Лорд-капитана: твари из картины, поглотив Леди Кассию, затащили в пучины тьмы свою вторую жертву.

traits.locale_text: Ignoring Cassia's pleas for help, the Lord Captain dashed for the exit but immediately slipped on a pool of the Lady Navigator's blood and fell, cutting {mf|his|her} hand on a piece of glass. Something dug its claws into the Lord Captain's leg, and the creatures from the painting, having already consumed Cassia whole, dragged their second victim into the darkness.

Something dug its claws into the Lord Captain's leg, and the creatures from the painting, having already consumed Cassia whole, dragged their second victim into the darkness.

Something dug its claws into the Lord Captain's leg and the creatures from the painting, having already consumed Cassia whole, dragged their second victim into the dark abyss.

Something dug its claws into the Lord Captain's leg and the creatures from the painting, having already consumed Cassia whole, dragged their second victim into the dark abyss.

Ignoring Cassia's pleas for help, the Lord Captain dashed for the exit but immediately slipped on a pool of the Lady Navigator's blood and fell, cutting {mf|his|her} hand on shards of glass. Something dug its claws into the Lord Captain's leg and the creatures from the painting, having already consumed Cassia whole, dragged their second victim into the dark abyss.

languages.text: 助けを乞うカシアを無視してロード・キャプテンは出口へと急いだ。しかし間髪入れずに航宙士の血だまりで滑って転倒し、ガラスの破片で手を切ってしまった。何かがロード・キャプテンの脚に爪を突き立てると、とうにカシアの全身を吸収していた絵から現れた怪物は、第二の犠牲者を底知れぬ暗い穴へと引き込んだ。
languages.original_text: Ignoring Cassia's pleas for help, the Lord Captain dashed for the exit but immediately slipped on a pool of the Lady Navigator's blood and fell, cutting {mf|his|her} hand on shards of glass. Something dug its claws into the Lord Captain's leg and the creatures from the painting, having already consumed Cassia whole, dragged their second victim into the dark abyss.

traits.locale_text: 助けを乞うカシアを無視してロード・キャプテンは出口へと急いだ。しかし間髪入れずに航宙士の血だまりで滑って転倒し、ガラスの破片で手を切ってしまった。何かがロード・キャプテンの脚に爪を突き立てると、とうにカシアの全身を吸収していた絵から現れた怪物は、第二の犠牲者を底知れぬ暗い穴へと引き込んだ。

languages.text: 舰长大人不顾卡西娅的呼救，朝着出口拔足狂奔，但随后就滑倒在了卡西娅的血泊之中，手也被玻璃碎片割伤了。画中的生物已经将卡西娅彻底吞没，随后它的爪子嵌进了舰长大人的腿里，将第二位受害者也拖入了黑暗的深渊之中。
languages.original_text: Ignoring Cassia's pleas for help, the Lord Captain dashed for the exit but immediately slipped on a pool of the Lady Navigator's blood and fell, cutting {mf|his|her} hand on shards of glass. Something dug its claws into the Lord Captain's leg and the creatures from the painting, having already consumed Cassia whole, dragged their second victim into the dark abyss.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人不顾卡西娅的呼救，朝着出口拔足狂奔，但随后就滑倒在了卡西娅的血泊之中，手也被玻璃碎片割伤了。画中的生物已经将卡西娅彻底吞没，随后它的爪子嵌进了舰长大人的腿里，将第二位受害者也拖入了黑暗的深渊之中。

languages.text: Ignorant les appels à l'aide de Cassia, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} s'est {mf|rué|ruée} vers la sortie, mais dans sa précipitation, {mf|il|elle} a glissé sur une flaque de sang de la dame navigatrice et s'est entaillé la main sur un fragment de verre. Quelque chose a alors planté ses griffes dans la jambe {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} et les créatures de la toile, après avoir complètement absorbé Cassia, ont lentement, mais sûrement, attiré leur seconde victime dans les abysses.
languages.original_text: Ignoring Cassia's pleas for help, the Lord Captain dashed for the exit but immediately slipped on a pool of the Lady Navigator's blood and fell, cutting {mf|his|her} hand on shards of glass. Something dug its claws into the Lord Captain's leg and the creatures from the painting, having already consumed Cassia whole, dragged their second victim into the dark abyss.

traits.locale_text: Ignorant les appels à l'aide de Cassia, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} s'est {mf|rué|ruée} vers la sortie, mais dans sa précipitation, {mf|il|elle} a glissé sur une flaque de sang de la dame navigatrice et s'est entaillé la main sur un fragment de verre. Quelque chose a alors planté ses griffes dans la jambe {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} et les créatures de la toile, après avoir complètement absorbé Cassia, ont lentement, mais sûrement, attiré leur seconde victime dans les abysses.

languages.text: Ignorando las súplicas de auxilio de Cassia, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán se abalanzó hacia la salida, pero resbaló en un charco de la sangre de la lady Navegante y cayó al suelo encima de unos cristales rotos que le hicieron cortes en las manos. Algo hundió sus garras en la pierna {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán y las criaturas del cuadro, que ya habían engullido del todo a Cassia, arrastraron a su segunda víctima hacia el oscuro abismo.
languages.original_text: Ignoring Cassia's pleas for help, the Lord Captain dashed for the exit but immediately slipped on a pool of the Lady Navigator's blood and fell, cutting {mf|his|her} hand on shards of glass. Something dug its claws into the Lord Captain's leg and the creatures from the painting, having already consumed Cassia whole, dragged their second victim into the dark abyss.

traits.locale_text: Ignorando las súplicas de auxilio de Cassia, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán se abalanzó hacia la salida, pero resbaló en un charco de la sangre de la lady Navegante y cayó al suelo encima de unos cristales rotos que le hicieron cortes en las manos. Algo hundió sus garras en la pierna {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán y las criaturas del cuadro, que ya habían engullido del todo a Cassia, arrastraron a su segunda víctima hacia el oscuro abismo.

languages.text: Der Lord Captain ignorierte Cassias Hilferufe, sprintete zum Ausgang rutschte aber augenblicklich auf einer Pfütze des Bluts der Lady Navigator aus, stürzte und schnitt sich die Hand an Glasscherben auf. Irgendetwas rammte seine Klauen in das Bein des Lord Captains, und die Kreaturen aus dem Gemälde, die Cassia vollständig verschluckt hatten, zerrten ihr zweites Opfer in den dunklen Abgrund.
languages.original_text: Ignoring Cassia's pleas for help, the Lord Captain dashed for the exit but immediately slipped on a pool of the Lady Navigator's blood and fell, cutting {mf|his|her} hand on shards of glass. Something dug its claws into the Lord Captain's leg and the creatures from the painting, having already consumed Cassia whole, dragged their second victim into the dark abyss.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain ignorierte Cassias Hilferufe, sprintete zum Ausgang rutschte aber augenblicklich auf einer Pfütze des Bluts der Lady Navigator aus, stürzte und schnitt sich die Hand an Glasscherben auf. Irgendetwas rammte seine Klauen in das Bein des Lord Captains, und die Kreaturen aus dem Gemälde, die Cassia vollständig verschluckt hatten, zerrten ihr zweites Opfer in den dunklen Abgrund.

languages.text: Cassia'nın yardım çığlıklarını görmezden gelen Lord Kaptan, çıkışa doğru koşarken Leydi Rotacı'nın kanından oluşan bir birikintide kayarak düşünce cam parçalarıyla elini kesti. Tablodan çıkan yaratıklar, Cassia'yı tamamen tükettikten sonra Lord Kaptan'ın bacağını kaptıkları gibi o karanlık hiçliğe bir başka kurbanı daha sürüklemiş oldu.
languages.original_text: Ignoring Cassia's pleas for help, the Lord Captain dashed for the exit but immediately slipped on a pool of the Lady Navigator's blood and fell, cutting {mf|his|her} hand on shards of glass. Something dug its claws into the Lord Captain's leg and the creatures from the painting, having already consumed Cassia whole, dragged their second victim into the dark abyss.

traits.locale_text: Cassia'nın yardım çığlıklarını görmezden gelen Lord Kaptan, çıkışa doğru koşarken Leydi Rotacı'nın kanından oluşan bir birikintide kayarak düşünce cam parçalarıyla elini kesti. Tablodan çıkan yaratıklar, Cassia'yı tamamen tükettikten sonra Lord Kaptan'ın bacağını kaptıkları gibi o karanlık hiçliğe bir başka kurban daha sürükledi.
